mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS(user_id, user_email, user_name, user_password_hash, user_role, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userEmail}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{userRole}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET user_role = #{userRole}, updated_at = now() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
